title: Mirage Fools the Ear, Mute Hides the Truth: Precise Targeted Adversarial Attacks on Polyphonic Sound Event Detection Systems
summary: Sound Event Detection (SED) systems are increasingly deployed in safety-critical applications such as industrial monitoring and audio surveillance. However, their robustness against adversarial attacks has not been well explored.
